<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">81ee2efb1b22e110062a404cbc4bcb3a</macroponent><name>input_1/pattern</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  var hiB = api.data.bids.results[0].bid_amount.value;
  if(api.state.bidAmount <=hiB){
    return true;
  }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-05-09 00:47:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>779643f31ba2e110062a404cbc4bcb91</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>input_1/pattern</sys_name><sys_package display_value="LiveAuction" source="x_87436_liveauct_0">12f5ea731b22e110062a404cbc4bcbde</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="LiveAuction">12f5ea731b22e110062a404cbc4bcbde</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_779643f31ba2e110062a404cbc4bcb91</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-05-09 00:47:20</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
